text: Sonia Margarita Silvestre Ortiz (16 August 1952 - 19 April 2014) was a Dominican singer and announcer. Her best known songs were "Esta Es Sonia Silvestre" (1974), "Yo Quiero Andar" (1990) and "Verde y Negro" (2007). She was born in San Pedro de Macor√≠s, Dominican Republic. Silvestre died from complications due to a stroke and two heart attacks on 19 April 2014 in Santo Domingo. She was 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * Sonia Silvestre biography Category:1952 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Dominican Republic musicians Category:Singers
title: Sonia Silvestre
